Delicious tasting ðŸ˜‹ crisp pizza. Homely type of pizzaria. Fries was good and fresh too. Ordered 3 pcs of 12 inches and 3 bottle of sarsipira. A box of truffle fries. It was filling.

A great find indeed along Meyer road, located inside the Makena condo. Kevin is very friendly and offered to customize the pizza to my boy's preference. The pizza is definitely cooked on the spot and we had a good dinner. Will definitely be visiting often in future to try the other items on the menu

We ordered the Italiano thin crust & it was still delicious when we got home! It was a mistake to have only ordered ONE 12 inch, think we should have gotten at least 3 ðŸ¤£ If you are collecting the pizza, the shop is inside a condo (can't remember the name).
A hidden gem of a pizzeria. The Neapolitan and Prosciutto were absolutely delicious! Some of the best I've ever had.
